All Records
Rohit sharma

Captain Rohit

Rohit Sharma, affectionately known as "Hitman" by fans, is an eminent Indian cricketer born on April 30, 1987, in Nagpur, India. A dynamic right-handed batsman and occasional off-break bowler, Sharma is celebrated for his exceptional skills in limited-overs cricket. Known for his ability to score big runs, Rohit Sharma holds the record for the highest individual score in One Day Internationals (ODIs) with an impressive 264 runs against Sri Lanka in 2014. His elegant strokeplay, coupled with a calm and composed demeanor, has made him a key player in the Indian cricket team.
